description:
Because of his virginity curse, Kei`ichiro can`t touch a woman.  To work off stress and hopefully find a girlfriend, he goes into town with his buddy.  At a tea house they encounter a young girl, but she`s actually a transforming fox.  Kei`ichiro and his friend Hyakusuke are caught up in trouble over this.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La sensation du quartier de débauche, Chiharu, la femme-renarde !
Senjou no Hanamachi, Youko no Chiharu!
The Alluring Red Light District and the Foxy Chiharu!
扇情の花街, 妖狐のちはる!
